attributes.action: resign or face a vote of no confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government do not seem to operate on common sense; they make lunatic policies which DO NOT WORK but then do not retract them, no, that would be too sensible - instead, they 'patch it up' with more laws and policies never solving the root cause.  It's time for them to go.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
